General.Name: Asuransi Ramayana Tbk
General.Description: PT Asuransi Ramayana Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a general insurance company in Indonesia. The company operates through two segments, General Insurance and Rental of Office Buildings. It offers property, motor vehicle, personal accident, marine, health, engineering, bond, fire, marine cargo, property, money, liability, freight, ship frame, marine hull, aviation, and miscellaneous, as well as Sharia insurance products. The company also engages in office building and car rental activities. PT Asuransi Ramayana Tbk was founded in 1956 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.
General.Address: Jalan Kebon Sirih No. 49, Jakarta, Indonesia, 10340
